se3projecta.Model
Class TheatreSession

java.lang.Object
  se3projecta.Model.TheatreSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
XmlSerializable, XmlUnserializable<java.lang.Integer>
public class TheatreSession
extends java.lang.Object
implements XmlSerializable, XmlUnserializable<java.lang.Integer>

Allows Booking of Seats for a particular SessionTime for a particular Theatre.
